ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] More than 6 in a group?
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t catch the message last night. I never thought of it as an exploit. Now I do. It d be a shame to lose everything I ve worked for over the past seven
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't catch the message last night. I never thought of it as an exploit.
Now I do.

It'd be a shame to lose everything I've worked for over the past seven
months just to sneak an extra person into the group.

Definitely not worth it.

>The servers were down for an emergency patch today.
>Coincidence? Someone want to see if this still works?

The servers went down yesterday to fix problems with sound that were causing
people to crash and lock up randomly. Last night was the first time in four
months that I was able to play the game with sound for more than 5 minutes
before I had to reboot my computer.

Oh, and that sweet DING! sound as I hit 25! :)

-KS


>For the record, there was a system message this evening officially
declairing the use of this bug an exploit warrenting immediate suspension.

Just so you know.
